italic.text: Units may be contaminated during an NBC incident. To avoid an NBC contamination and intoxication of other units (contamination can spread around and contaminate other units), contaminated units should be decontaminated with appropriate means.

line.text: In SWORD, an agent must go through a decontamination site object to get decontaminated. The decontamination process is effective if the decontamination site is operated by other units.
